name: cambric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
light cloth made from cotton or linen (= a natural fibre): She wore a blouse of cream cambric and a long amber-coloured skirt. The duvets have 100 percent cotton cambric covers.
More examplesFewer examplesHe favoured elaborately tied cravats in white cambric.The man looked elegant in an open-necked, spotless, white cambric shirt. He was holding his cambric handkerchief to his head.Her shoulders were covered over with a white cambric nightgown trimmed with lace.
